strings.page_1: The presence of only the control line (C) and no test line (T) within the result window indicates a negative result.
strings.page_2: The presence of the test line (T) and the control line (C) within the result window, regardless of which line appears first, indicates a positive result.
strings.page_2a: Caution: The presence of any test line (T), no matter how faint, indicates a positive result.
strings.page_3: If the control line (C) is not visible within the result window after performing the test, the result is considered invalid.
strings.page_3a: Instructions may not have been followed correctly. It is recommended to read the IFU again before re-testing the specimen with a new test device.
